text: Alex Cook (born 2 May 1973) is an Australian mixed martial artist. He competed in the Welterweight, Middleweight and Light heavyweight divisions. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Win | align=center| 6-5 | Alessandro Custodio | Submission (punches) | SRF 12: Spartan Reality Fight 12 | | align=center| 2 | align=center| 1:00 | Gold Coast, Australia | |- | Win | align=center| 5-5 | Ray Cooper | Submission (neck crank) | Shooto: R.E.A.D.
